projects.title: Take Ten
projects.description: This project solves problems for people in a more stationary lifestyle to find the time to stay active. It removes the pain-point of deciding what workout to do, while still tailoring the experience to the needs of the user.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: Pat Salmon/'s Salmon Cookies is a fictional website for a cookie maker that specializes in cookies made of salmon. This site gives a history of the product as well as a location for storing of distribution numbers from their global distrobution centers.

projects.title: About Me
projects.description: One of the first sites I built was a simple introduction website. It displayed images and information about me. This was built with HTML and CSS. It also had a minigame using prompts to ask the user questions about me.
